title: Steigenberger Nile Palace
description: The 5-star Steigenberger Nile Palace is situated in the heart of Luxor and provides modern accommodation with stunning views of the Nile.

title: Luxor Temple
description: A temple built for the ritual practices exercised at the most important Ancient Egyptian festival, The Festival of Opet.

title: El Tarboush
description: El Tarboush is celebrated by many travelers for its authentic Lebanese cuisine, with dishes that are both expertly crafted and generously portioned.

title: Iberotel Luxor
description: A heated pool floating on the Nile is one of the most unique features of this 4-star hotel. Overlooking the Theben Hills, Iberotel Luxor also offers a restaurant boat and rooms with private balconies.

title: Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor
description: Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor is popular among travelers for its spacious, elegant rooms, although some note that the furnishings feel outdated.

title: Valley of the Kings
description: This desert valley contains the ancient burial ground of many Egyptian pharaohs. Among over 60 royal tombs is the famous Tomb of Tutankhamen that was found in pristine condition.

title: Sofra Restaurant & Cafe
description: A restaurant located in the heart of Luxor that draws its inspiration from the rich Arabian culture. Sofra is situated in an old 1930s Egyptian house that still retains its traditional character.

title: Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa
description: Nestled on the banks of the Nile, Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa offers stylish rooms with uninterrupted views from the water’s edge, luxurious spa facilities and stunning infinity pools.

title: Pyramids of Giza
description: Iconic ancient monuments including the Great Pyramid and the Sphinx, located on the Giza

title: Egyptian Museum
description: Home to thousands of ancient artifacts including the treasures of King Tutankhamun.

title: Khan El Khalili
description: This vibrant open-air bazaar is a treasure trove of Egyptian culture, with bustling streets filled with local artisans and vendors. Here, you can pick up unique souvenirs like spices and perfumes, or simply soak up the local atmosphere.

title: Intercontinental Cairo Semiramis
description: On the historic Semiramis hotel site, guests can enjoy modern luxury by the river Nile. Semiramis InterContinental Cairo is located in the heart of downtown Cairo, next to the Egyptian Museum and Khan el Khalili.

title: Al Azhar Mosque
description: Al-Azhar Mosque is a historic Islamic landmark in Cairo and one of the oldest centers of Islamic learning in the world.

title: The Citadel
description: A medieval Islamic fort with panoramic views of Cairo and the iconic Mosque

title: Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino
description: Le Passage Cairo Hotel & Casino is located in Heliopolis, an elegant business and residential district in Cairo and it is considered one of the safest area in town. The hotel is only five minutes from Cairo International Airport and ten minutes from the Cairo International Convention Centre and Fair Grounds, with free shuttle bus service, free wifi and free internet. Great design is the key to this urban, cosmopolitan business and leisure base, providing a sophisticated and stylish environment in the throbbing heart of Egypt and the Middle East.

title: Steigenberger Hotel El Tahrir Cairo
description: Among Cairo hotels, Steigenberger El Tahrir secures a spectacular location in El Tahrir Square, overlooking the Egyptian museum, minutes away from Khan El Khalili Bazar, and in close proximity to Egypt’s major attractions with a total area of 21,633 sqm.

title: Sofitel Legend Old Cataract Aswan
description: Hotel Complex encompassing famous Victorian-style Cataract Hotel & adjacent high-rise New Cataract Hotel (1963).

title: Movenpick Resort Aswan
description: Mövenpick Resort Aswan provides a tranquil environment of lush tropical gardens and magnificent views of the River Nile . Located on its own island , the hotel offers 404 rooms & suites , 6 restaurants & bars , two swimming pools , recreation facilities and lavish landscape.

title: Nubian Museum
description: This museum traces the history from the earliest settlements to present day of Nubia, the region defined as the area between Aswan in Egypt and Khartoum in the Sudan.

title: Unfinished Obelisk
description: This gigantic semi-finished obelisk, dating from the New Kingdom, would have weighed a staggering 1,197 tons if completed.

title: Temple of Philae
description: This large temple complex, relocated to the island of Agilika with the building of the High Dam in Aswan, features the magnificent Temple of Isis that was built in the late Ptolemaic and early Roman periods.

title: 1902 Restaurant
description: A heated pool floating on the Nile is one of the most unique features of this 4-star hotel. Overlooking the Theben Hills, Iberotel Luxor also offers a restaurant boat and rooms with private balconies.

title: Kato Dool Wellness Resort
description: Live like a local Nubian in an eco-friendly wellness sanctuary. Katodool Wellness is ideally located on the hillside of the Nubian Village in Aswan, embracing the beauty of the surrounding nature of the river Nile and the protectorate of Salouga and Ghazal, preserving the genuine Nubian lifestyle and its mindfulness activities.

title: Solaih Nubian Restaurant
description: Nubian kitchen is rich with its recipes, but unfortunately these recipes are not commonly used right now among Nubians and started to disappear. Our aim was to establish a Nubian restaurant that provide only Nubian cuisine with old and new recipes. The restaurant is located in a premium location on an island overlooking the famous Philae temple.

title: Rixos Premium Seagate
description: All‑inclusive beachfront resort with private beach, diving center and spa services.

title: Naama Bay
description: Souvenir shops, cafes, water‑sports and vibrant nightlife along a sandy bay.

title: Ras Mohammed National Park
description: Protected marine park with pristine reef systems and migratory bird habitats.

title: Soho Square
description: Upscale entertainment hub with restaurants, live performances and arcade games.

title: Tirana Beach
description: Relaxed sandy cove with calm waters ideal for snorkeling and swimming.

title: Na’ama Aquarium
description: Small aquarium showcasing Red Sea marine life species in eye‑level tanks.

title: Old Market Sharm
description: Colorful bazaar with local crafts, spices and casual dining options.

title: Al Mustafa Mosque
description: Beautiful Ottoman‑style mosque located near the marina area.

title: Marriott Mena House
description: Luxury hotel near the pyramids.

title: Pyramids Hotel
description: A beautiful stay with pyramid views.

title: Four Seasons Hotel Cairo
description: 5-star hotel overlooking the Nile.

title: Cleopatra Luxury Resort
description: Beachfront resort with modern amenities.

title: Sofitel Winter Palace
description: Historic hotel in Luxor with royal charm.

title: Mövenpick Resort
description: Peaceful retreat by the Nile.

image: ../public/bookingHotels/The V Luxury Resort Sahl Hasheesh, Hurghada.webp
title: The V Luxury Resort Sahl Hasheesh
description: Exclusive resort with sea views.

title: Casa Cook
description: Boho-chic style boutique hotel.

title: hostel8.jpg
description: Historic hotel in the heart of Alexandria.

title: Rixos Premium Magawish (Hurghada)
description: Luxury beachfront resort with villas and pools.

title: Jaz Aquaviva (Sharm El Sheikh)
description: 5-star resort with a large water park.

title: Steigenberger Nile Palace
description: Experience comfort and elegance with Nile views, spa services, and gourmet restaurants in the heart of Luxor.

title: Four Seasons Alexandria at San Stefano
description: Luxury hotel on the Corniche with sea views.

title: Sofitel Legend Old Cataract
description: Enjoy royal treatment in this historic palace overlooking the Nile, known for its stunning architecture and luxury service.

title: Osiris Hotel Cairo
description: Affordable, clean hotel in downtown with easy access to metro and attractions.

title: The Gabriel Hotel
description: Boutique luxury hotel with elegant decor, rooftop pool, and personalized service.

title: City View Hotel
description: Budget-friendly hotel with clean rooms, friendly staff, and great city views.

title: Kempinski Nile Hotel Cairo
description: Luxury hotel offering Nile-view suites, rooftop pool, gourmet dining, and spa.

title: Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa
description: Elegant resort with Nile views, infinity pools, full-service spa, and tranquil gardens.

title: Jaz Mirabel Resort
description: Beachfront resort with private beach, water activities, and family-friendly amenities.

title: Maritim Jolie Ville Resort & Casino
description: Vibrant resort with beachfront access, casino, restaurants, and vibrant nightlife.

name: Crave
cuisine: international cuisine with a contemporary twist

name: Zooba
cuisine: Egyptian street food with a modern twist
